title: Are You Better Off Now Than During the 2008 Recession?
dc:creator: run75441
description:
I believe we are. This is kind of interesting. The article on the budget deficit is from August. From what I have been reading in WaPo, etc., they are claiming the deficit increased. This does not surprise me either with all the inflation occurring from oil, supply chain issues, etc. The question to ask is […]

The post Are You Better Off Now Than During the 2008 Recession? appeared first on Angry Bear.
